name: Halloween Match 3 Spooky Holiday Game FREE
name_original: Halloween Match 3 Spooky Holiday Game FREE
description:
+++++++WICKEDLY FUN HALLOWEEN GAME++++++++
*************************************************************************************************
Pumpkins, and Witches, and Ghosts.....Oh, My!!!!
*************************************************************************************************

Download this game (If you Dare!) and begin a spooky adventure filled with challenges puzzles and matching!!! This ghouling game may appear easy at first....but it becomes creepily difficult as you survive each level!!!

GAME FEATURES:
-Spooky Maps and Trails
-Exciting and Challenging Game Play
-Tons of Fun Levels!
-Spook-tacular Halloween Graphics!!!!
-Holiday fun for all ages!!!

Grab your friends and play this terrifying game today!!!!
